template<class T, class LargeNumber = double>
void CumulativeStats< T, LargeNumber >::addData ( T  dat  )  [inline]

Add a vector of data, keeping a running tab of the mean, and variance statistics.

Algorithm from: Donald E. Knuth (1998). The Art of Computer Programming, volume 2: Seminumerical Algorithms, 3rd edn., p. 232. Boston: Addison-Wesley.

Parameters:
dat - New vector of data with one data point per chip.
